creator.description:
Semi-automated labeler that looks for brand accounts.

https://silencebrand.xyz

locales.description: This account appears to be impersonating a brand. Bluesky moderation has a better system for this, but this is an intermediary label to use while official Bluesky moderation reviews reports.
locales.name: Potential Brand Impersonation

locales.description:
This account was detected by automation as a potential brand account and may not be not a standard user. 

Current detection criteria: account handle matches domain in top 50,000 domains worldwide per CloudFlare.
locales.name: Potential Brand Account

locales.description: This account appears to represent a brand and may not be not a standard user.
locales.name: Brand Account
